channel.title: [Kick Command
channel.description: Ok so what I have been trying to do is, letting certain players kick, I've tried adding there name into the command as well so their only alot to use it but it doesn't seem to work, I am using a PI base atm and would love to figure a solution out for this (project Insanity).

item.title: [Kick Command
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

The “USERNAMEHERE” needs to be the exact case. SO my suggestion would be to make it .toLowerCase() the username then compare it.

Read full topic

item.title: [Kick Command
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

escalation:

Once again… just make public voids…

You don’t need a public void for just 1 little command.

OT: Change the USERNAME HERE to your username, but uppercase the first letter.

item.title: [Kick Command
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“kick”) && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“USERNAMEHERE”))) {
try {
String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(5);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) {
Server.playerHandler.players[i].disconnected = true;
}
}
}
} catch(Exception e) {
c.sendMessage(“Player Must Be Offline.”);
}
}

Read full topic
